trans-unit.source: Represents a set of methods for creating instances of a provider's implementation of the data source classes.
Initializes a new instance of a <xref href="System.Data.Common.DbProviderFactory"></xref> class.
Use one of the `DbProviderFactories.GetFactory` methods to get an instance of <xref:System.Data.Common.DbProviderFactory>.
Specifies whether the specific <xref href="System.Data.Common.DbProviderFactory"></xref> supports the <xref href="System.Data.Common.DbDataSourceEnumerator"></xref> class.

<xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if the instance of the <xref href="System.Data.Common.DbProviderFactory"></xref> supports the <xref href="System.Data.Common.DbDataSourceEnumerator"></xref> class; otherwise <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
Returns a new instance of the provider's class that implements the <xref href="System.Data.Common.DbCommand"></xref> class.
A new instance of <xref href="System.Data.Common.DbCommand"></xref>.
Returns a new instance of the provider's class that implements the <xref href="System.Data.Common.DbCommandBuilder"></xref> class.
A new instance of <xref href="System.Data.Common.DbCommandBuilder"></xref>.
Returns a new instance of the provider's class that implements the <xref href="System.Data.Common.DbConnection"></xref> class.
A new instance of <xref href="System.Data.Common.DbConnection"></xref>.
Returns a new instance of the provider's class that implements the <xref href="System.Data.Common.DbConnectionStringBuilder"></xref> class.
A new instance of <xref href="System.Data.Common.DbConnectionStringBuilder"></xref>.
Returns a new instance of the provider's class that implements the <xref href="System.Data.Common.DbDataAdapter"></xref> class.
A new instance of <xref href="System.Data.Common.DbDataAdapter"></xref>.
Returns a new instance of the provider's class that implements the <xref href="System.Data.Common.DbDataSourceEnumerator"></xref> class.
A new instance of <xref href="System.Data.Common.DbDataSourceEnumerator"></xref>.
Returns a new instance of the provider's class that implements the <xref href="System.Data.Common.DbParameter"></xref> class.
A new instance of <xref href="System.Data.Common.DbParameter"></xref>.
Returns a new instance of the provider's class that implements the provider's version of the <xref href="System.Security.CodeAccessPermission"></xref> class.
One of the <xref href="System.Security.Permissions.PermissionState"></xref> values.
A <xref href="System.Security.CodeAccessPermission"></xref> object for the specified <xref href="System.Security.Permissions.PermissionState"></xref>.
